categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Hove was a human male who served as captain of the Imperial Star Destroyer Vehement around the time of the Battle of Yavin. He worked with Commander Alecia Beck of the ISB to find the Rebel Alliance Shrike Caluan Ematt.
Hove first appeared in the 2015 canon young readers book Smuggler's Run: A Han Solo & Chewbacca Adventure.
